Name: Lime Bar
Review Text: Great coctails, bartender able to advise you about any attraction. Just ask. Nice atmosphere. Must visit. Red light visit 2 minutes walk from here :)

Review Text: This place is great! Clearly the best cocktail joint in Amsterdam. Had the razzberry mojito and strawberry margarita and both were incredibly good. Happy hour now ‚Ç¨6 a drink till 9pm. Come here if you fancy a good drink.
